ch.linetic.camera

Interface CameraInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Kinect, KinectSimulator

    public interface CameraInterface
    The camera interface encapsulates the role of a camera by describing what we need from that camera. In our case, we need the camera to be able to update itself but we also need it to capture the pose of a user
    Author:
    ketsio

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PoseInterface capture(UserInterface user)
      Capture the pose (position of all parts of the body) given a user
      processing.core.PImage getImage()
      Take a picture of the actual scene
      boolean isConnected()
      Check if the camera is connected
      void update()
      Simply updates the camera (next image)

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update()
        Simply updates the camera (next image)

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Check if the camera is connected
        Returns:
        true if connected, false otherwise

      • capture

        PoseInterface capture(UserInterface user)
        Capture the pose (position of all parts of the body) given a user
        Parameters:
        user - the user being analyzed
        Returns:
        the actual pose of the user

      • getImage

        processing.core.PImage getImage()
        Take a picture of the actual scene
        Returns:
        a PImage (image in Processing)
